roleset.name: Move articularors to pronuonce and enunciate

example.name: another unconventional arg 1
example.text: Articulation of the rhotic is difficult for him.

roleset.note: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to articulate-v.. Articulate.01 is a member of VN class say-37.7-1. Articulate is a member of FN class Expressing_publicly.Framed by Katie.
